titleStmt.title: Certayne sermons appoynted by the Quenes Maiestie, to be declared and read, by all persones, vycars, and curates, euery Sondaye and holy daye in theyr churches : and by her Graces aduyse perused & ouer sene, for the better vnderstandyng of the simple people : newly imprinted in partes accordynge as is mencioned in the booke of commune prayers.
Certain sermons or homilies appointed to be read in churches.

notesStmt.note: Title within ornamental border, with initials "R.I." enclosed in ring with motto "Desuper omnia", in sill.
Imperfect: stained, worn, with print show-through and loss of text; lacking signatures E₄ and Aa₄ (colophon).
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
